   20: 
   21: -module(pbe_SUITE).
   22: 
   23: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   24: -include_lib("public_key/include/public_key.hrl").
   25: 
   26: -export([
   27:          suite/0,
   28:          all/0,
   29:          groups/0,
   30:          init_per_suite/1,
   31:          end_per_suite/1,
   32:          init_per_group/2,
   33:          end_per_group/2,
   34:          init_per_testcase/2,
   35:          end_per_testcase/2,
   36:          pbdkdf1/0,
   37:          pbdkdf1/1,
   38:          pbdkdf2/0,
   39:          pbdkdf2/1,
   40:          old_pbe/0,
   41:          old_pbe/1,
   42:          pbes1/0,
   43:          pbes1/1,
   44:          pbes2/0,
   45:          pbes2/1
   46:         ]).
   47: 
   48: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   49: %% Common Test interface functions -----------------------------------
   50: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   51: 
   52: suite() -> 
   53:     [].
   54: 
   55: all() -> 
   56:     [
   57:      pbdkdf1,
   58:      pbdkdf2,
   59:      old_pbe,
   60:      pbes1,
   61:      pbes2].
   62: 
   63: groups() -> 
   64:     [].
   65: 
   66: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   67: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   68:     application:stop(crypto),
   69:     try crypto:start() of
   70: 	ok ->
   71: 	    Config
   72:     catch _:_ ->
   73: 	    {skip, "Crypto did not start"}
   74:     end.
   75: 
   76: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   77:     application:stop(crypto).
   78: 
   79: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   80: 
   81: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   82:     Config.
   83: 
   84: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   85:     Config.
   86: 
   87: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   88: init_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
   89:    Config.
   90: 
   91: 
   92: end_per_testcase(_TestCase, _Config) ->
   93:    ok.
   94: 
   95: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   96: %% Test Cases --------------------------------------------------------
   97: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   98: 
   99: pbdkdf1() ->
  100:     [{doc,"Test with PKCS #5 PBKDF1 Test Vectors"}].
  101: pbdkdf1(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  102:     %%Password = "password"
  103:     %%     = (0x)70617373776F7264
  104:     %%Salt     = (0x)78578E5A5D63CB06
  105:     %%Count    = 1000
  106:     %%kLen     = 16
  107:     %%Key      = PBKDF1(Password, Salt, Count, kLen)
  108:     %%= (0x)DC19847E05C64D2FAF10EBFB4A3D2A20
  109: 
  110:     Password = "password",
  111:     Salt = <<16#78,16#57,16#8E,16#5A,16#5D,16#63,16#CB,16#06>>,
  112:     Count = 1000,
  113: 
  114:    <<16#DC, 16#19, 16#84, 16#7E,
  115:      16#05, 16#C6, 16#4D, 16#2F,
  116:      16#AF, 16#10, 16#EB, 16#FB,
  117:      16#4A, 16#3D, 16#2A, 16#20, _/binary>> =
  118: 	pubkey_pbe:pbdkdf1(Password, Salt, Count, sha).
  119: 
  120: pbdkdf2() ->
  121:     [{doc,"Test with PKCS #5 PBKDF2 Test Vectors"}].
  122: pbdkdf2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  123:     %% Input:
  124:     %%   P = "password" (8 octets)
  125:     %%   S = "salt" (4 octets)
  126:     %%   c = 1
  127:     %%   dkLen = 20
  128:     
  129:     %% Output:
  130:     %%   DK = 0c 60 c8 0f 96 1f 0e 71
  131:     %%        f3 a9 b5 24 af 60 12 06
  132:     %%        2f e0 37 a6             (20 octets)
  133:     
  134:     <<16#0c, 16#60, 16#c8, 16#0f, 16#96, 16#1f, 16#0e, 16#71,
  135:       16#f3, 16#a9, 16#b5, 16#24, 16#af, 16#60, 16#12, 16#06,
  136:       16#2f, 16#e0, 16#37, 16#a6>> = pubkey_pbe:pbdkdf2("password", "salt", 1, 20, fun hmac4/4, sha, 20),
  137:     
  138:     %% Input:
  139:     %%   P = "password" (8 octets)
  140:     %%   S = "salt" (4 octets)
  141:     %%   c = 2
  142:     %%   dkLen = 20
  143:     
  144:     %% Output:
  145:     %%   DK = ea 6c 01 4d c7 2d 6f 8c
  146:     %%   cd 1e d9 2a ce 1d 41 f0
  147:     %%   d8 de 89 57             (20 octets)
  148:     
  149:     <<16#ea, 16#6c, 16#01, 16#4d, 16#c7, 16#2d, 16#6f, 16#8c, 
  150:       16#cd, 16#1e, 16#d9, 16#2a, 16#ce, 16#1d, 16#41, 16#f0,  
  151:       16#d8,  16#de,  16#89, 16#57>>  =
  152: 	pubkey_pbe:pbdkdf2("password", "salt", 2, 20, fun hmac4/4, sha, 20),
  153: 
  154:      %% Input:
  155:      %%   P = "password" (8 octets)
  156:      %%   S = "salt" (4 octets)
  157:      %%   c = 4096
  158:      %%   dkLen = 20
  159: 
  160:      %% Output:
  161:      %%   DK = 4b 00 79 01 b7 65 48 9a
  162:      %%        be ad 49 d9 26 f7 21 d0
  163:      %%        65 a4 29 c1             (20 octets)
  164: 
  165:     <<16#4b, 16#00, 16#79, 16#01, 16#b7, 16#65, 16#48, 16#9a,
  166:       16#be, 16#ad, 16#49, 16#d9, 16#26, 16#f7, 16#21, 16#d0,
  167:       16#65, 16#a4, 16#29, 16#c1>> = pubkey_pbe:pbdkdf2("password", "salt", 4096, 20, fun hmac4/4, sha, 20),
  168: 
  169:     %% Input:
  170:     %%    P = "password" (8 octets)
  171:     %%    S = "salt" (4 octets)
  172:     %%    c = 16777216
  173:     %%    dkLen = 20
  174: 
  175:     %%  Output:
  176:     %%    DK = ee fe 3d 61 cd 4d a4 e4
  177:     %%         e9 94 5b 3d 6b a2 15 8c
  178:     %%         26 34 e9 84             (20 octets)
  179: 
  180:     
  181:     <<16#ee, 16#fe, 16#3d, 16#61, 16#cd, 16#4d, 16#a4, 16#e4, 
  182:       16#e9, 16#94, 16#5b, 16#3d, 16#6b, 16#a2, 16#15, 16#8c, 
  183:       16#26, 16#34, 16#e9, 16#84>> = pubkey_pbe:pbdkdf2("password", "salt", 16777216, 20, fun hmac4/4, sha, 20),
  184:     
  185:     %% Input:
  186:     %%    P = "passwordPASSWORDpassword" (24 octets)
  187:     %%    S = "saltSALTsaltSALTsaltSALTsaltSALTsalt" (36 octets)
  188:     %%    c = 4096
  189:     %%    dkLen = 25
  190: 
  191:     %%  Output:
  192:     %%    DK = 3d 2e ec 4f e4 1c 84 9b
  193:     %%         80 c8 d8 36 62 c0 e4 4a
  194:     %%         8b 29 1a 96 4c f2 f0 70
  195:     %%         38                      (25 octets)
  196:     
  197:     <<16#3d, 16#2e, 16#ec, 16#4f, 16#e4, 16#1c, 16#84, 16#9b, 
  198:       16#80, 16#c8, 16#d8, 16#36, 16#62, 16#c0, 16#e4, 16#4a, 
  199:       16#8b, 16#29, 16#1a, 16#96, 16#4c, 16#f2, 16#f0, 16#70, 
  200:       16#38>>
  201: 	= pubkey_pbe:pbdkdf2("passwordPASSWORDpassword", 
  202: 			     "saltSALTsaltSALTsaltSALTsaltSALTsalt", 4096, 25, fun hmac4/4, sha, 20),
  203:     
  204:      %% Input:
  205:      %%   P = "pass\0word" (9 octets)
  206:      %%   S = "sa\0lt" (5 octets)
  207:      %%   c = 4096
  208:      %%   dkLen = 16
  209: 
  210:      %% Output:
  211:      %%   DK = 56 fa 6a a7 55 48 09 9d
  212:      %%        cc 37 d7 f0 34 25 e0 c3 (16 octets)
  213: 
  214:     <<16#56, 16#fa, 16#6a, 16#a7, 16#55, 16#48, 16#09, 16#9d, 
  215:       16#cc, 16#37, 16#d7, 16#f0, 16#34, 16#25, 16#e0, 16#c3>>
  216: 	= pubkey_pbe:pbdkdf2("pass\0word", 
  217: 			     "sa\0lt", 4096, 16, fun hmac4/4, sha, 20).
  218: 
  219: pbes1() ->
  220:     [{doc,"Tests encode/decode EncryptedPrivateKeyInfo encrypted with different ciphers using PBES1"}].
  221: pbes1(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  222:     case lists:member(des_cbc, crypto:supports(ciphers))
  223:         andalso lists:member(md5, crypto:supports(hashs))
  224:     of
  225:         true ->
  226:             decode_encode_key_file("pbes1_des_cbc_md5_enc_key.pem", "password", "DES-CBC", Config);
  227:         false ->
  228:             {skip, alg_not_supported}
  229:     end.
  230: 
  231: pbes2() ->
  232:     [{doc,"Tests encode/decode EncryptedPrivateKeyInfo encrypted with different ciphers using PBES2"}].
  233: pbes2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  234:     case lists:member(des_cbc, crypto:supports(ciphers)) of
  235:         true ->
  236:             decode_encode_key_file("pbes2_des_cbc_enc_key.pem", "password", "DES-CBC", Config);
  237:         false ->
  238:             ok
  239:     end,
  240:     decode_encode_key_file("pbes2_des_ede3_cbc_enc_key.pem", "password", "DES-EDE3-CBC", Config),  
  241:     decode_encode_key_file("pbes2_aes_128_enc_key.pem", "password", "AES-128-CBC", Config),   
  242:     decode_encode_key_file("pbes2_aes_192_enc_key.pem", "password", "AES-192-CBC", Config),   
  243:     decode_encode_key_file("pbes2_aes_256_enc_key.pem", "password", "AES-256-CBC", Config),   
  244:     case lists:member(rc2_cbc, proplists:get_value(ciphers, crypto:supports())) of
  245: 	true ->
  246: 	    decode_encode_key_file("pbes2_rc2_cbc_enc_key.pem", "password", "RC2-CBC", Config);
  247: 	false ->
  248: 	    ok
  249:     end.
  250: old_pbe() ->
  251:     [{doc,"Tests encode/decode with old format used before PBE"}].
  252: old_pbe(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  253:      Datadir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  254:      % key generated with ssh-keygen -N hello_aes -f old_aes_128_cbc.pem
  255:     {ok, PemAes128Cbc} = file:read_file(filename:join(Datadir, "old_aes_128_cbc.pem")),
  256:     
  257:     PemAes128CbcEntries = public_key:pem_decode(PemAes128Cbc),
  258:     ct:print("Pem entry: ~p" , [PemAes128CbcEntries]),
  259:     [{'RSAPrivateKey', _, {"AES-128-CBC",_}} = Aes128CbcEntry] = PemAes128CbcEntries,
  260:     #'RSAPrivateKey'{} = Key = public_key:pem_entry_decode(Aes128CbcEntry, "hello_aes"),
  261:     
  262: 
  263:     %% Converted with openssl rsa -in old_aes_128_cbc.pem -out old_aes_256_cbc.pem -aes256
  264:    {ok, PemAes256Cbc} = file:read_file(filename:join(Datadir, "old_aes_256_cbc.pem")),
  265:     
  266:     PemAes256CbcEntries = public_key:pem_decode(PemAes256Cbc),
  267:     ct:print("Pem entry: ~p" , [PemAes256CbcEntries]),
  268:     [{'RSAPrivateKey', _, {"AES-256-CBC",_}} = Aes256CbcEntry] = PemAes256CbcEntries,
  269:     Key = public_key:pem_entry_decode(Aes256CbcEntry, "hello_aes").
  270:     
  271: decode_encode_key_file(File, Password, Cipher, Config) ->
  272:     Datadir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  273:     {ok, PemKey} = file:read_file(filename:join(Datadir, File)),
  274:     
  275:     PemEntry = public_key:pem_decode(PemKey),
  276:     [{Asn1Type, _, {Cipher,_} = CipherInfo} = PubEntry] = PemEntry,
  277:     #'RSAPrivateKey'{} = KeyInfo = public_key:pem_entry_decode(PubEntry, Password),
  278:     PemKey1 = public_key:pem_encode([public_key:pem_entry_encode(Asn1Type, KeyInfo, {CipherInfo, Password})]),
  279:     Pem = strip_ending_newlines(PemKey),
  280:     Pem = strip_ending_newlines(PemKey1).
  281: 
  282: strip_ending_newlines(Bin) ->
  283:     string:strip(binary_to_list(Bin), right, 10).
  284: 
  285: hmac4(SubType, Key, Data, MacLength) ->
  286:     crypto:macN(hmac, SubType, Key, Data, MacLength).
